Description_EN: Imagine your belly is a balloon. Breathe in to blow it up, breathe out to let it go.
Overview_YO: Gba èémí sínú láti fẹ́ fúfú ní inú rẹ, rọra jẹ́ kí ó jáde.
Overview_HA: Ka yi tunani kamar cikinka balloon ne. Shaka iska ka hura shi, sannan ka fuzgar da iskar.
Overview_IG: Chee na afọ gị bụ baluun. Kuru ume ka ị fụọ ya, kupụ ya rọrọ rọrọ.

Description_EN: Sit as still as a mountain. Storms may come, but the mountain does not move.
Overview_YO: Jókòó jẹ́ẹ́ bí òkè. Ìjì lè jà, ṣùgbọ́n òkè kò ní mì.
Overview_HA: Zauna shiru kamar dutse. Ko hadari ya zo, dutse ba ya motsi.
Overview_IG: Nyere ọtọ n'uju ka ugwu. Oké ifufe nwere ike ibilite, mana ugwu anaghị emegharị.

Description_EN: Think of someone you love and send them a 'silent wish' for happiness.
Overview_YO: Ronú nípa ẹni tí o fẹ́ràn, kí o sì ránsẹ́ ìfẹ́ dídákẹ́ fún ayọ̀ wọn.
Overview_HA: Yi tunanin wanda kake so, ka aika masa da fatan alheri a zuciyarka.
Overview_IG: Chee echiche banyere onye ị hụrụ n'anya, zigara ha mmasị dị jụụ maka obi ụtọ.

Description_EN: Close your eyes. List 3 sounds you can hear right now that you usually ignore.
Overview_YO: Pa ojú rẹ dé. Sọ àwọn ìró mẹ́ta tí o lè gbọ́ nísìnyìí.
Overview_HA: Rufe idanunka. Ka lissafa sauti guda 3 da kake ji yanzu waɗanda ba ka damu da su ba.
Overview_IG: Mechie anya gị. Kwuo ụda atọ ị na-anụ ugbu a ị na-anaghị ege ntị na mbụ.

Description_EN: Think of one thing that happened today that made you smile.
Overview_YO: Ronú nípa nǹkan kan tó ṣẹlẹ̀ lónìí tó mú kí o rẹ́rìn-ín.
Overview_HA: Ka yi tunanin abu guda daya da ya faru yau wanda ya sa ka farin ciki.
Overview_IG: Chee echiche banyere otu ihe mere taa mere ka ị mụmụọ ọnụ ọchị.

Description_EN: Wiggle your toes, then your legs, then your whole body. Then become completely still.
Overview_YO: Mi ọmọ ẹsẹ̀ rẹ, lẹ́yìn náà ẹsẹ̀ rẹ, àti gbogbo ara rẹ. Lẹ́yìn náà jókòó jẹ́ẹ́.
Overview_HA: Motsa yatsun kafarka, sannan kafafunka, sannan dukkan jikinka. Sannan ka tsaya cak.
Overview_IG: Megharịa mkpịsị ụkwụ gị, ụkwụ gị, na ahụ gị niile. Mgbe ahụ, nyere ọtọ n'uju.

Description_EN: Imagine a tiny candle flame at the center of your body. Keep your focus there.
Overview_YO: Sọ fojú inú wo iná fìtílà kékeré kan ní àárín ara rẹ. Pa ọkàn rẹ pọ̀ síbẹ̀.
Overview_HA: Yi tunanin hasken kyandir a tsakiyar jikinka. Ka mayar da hankalinka can.
Overview_IG: Chee echiche banyere ọkụ kandụl dị n'etiti ahụ gị. Lekwasị anya n'ebe ahụ.

Description_EN: Imagine you planted a seed. You cannot hurry it; you must wait for it to grow.
Overview_YO: Fojú inú wo pé o gbin irúgbìn kan. O kò lè kánjú mọ́ ọn; o gbọ́dọ̀ dúró kí ó dàgbà.
Overview_HA: Yi tunanin ka shuka iri. Ba za ka iya hanzarta shi ba; dole ka jira ya girma.
Overview_IG: Chee echiche na ị kụrụ mkpụrụ. I nweghị ike ịme ka ọ gbapụta ọsọ ọsọ; ị ga-echere ka ọ too.

Description_EN: Give yourself a hug. Now imagine hugging the whole world with peace.
Overview_YO: Gbá ara rẹ mọ́ra. Nísìnyìí fojú inú wo bí o ṣe ń gbá gbogbo ayé mọ́ra pẹ̀lú àlàáfíà.
Overview_HA: Ka rungume kanka. Sannan ka yi tunanin rungume dukkan duniya cikin zaman lafiya.
Overview_IG: Makụọ onwe gị. Ugbu a chee echiche ịmakụ ụwa niile n'udo.

Description_EN: Breathe in peace for yourself. Breathe out peace for your friends and family.
Overview_YO: Gba àlàáfíà sínú fún ara rẹ. Jẹ́ kí àlàáfíà jáde fún àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ àti ẹbí rẹ.
Overview_HA: Shaka zaman lafiya don kanka. Fuzgar da zaman lafiya don abokanka da iyalanka.
Overview_IG: Kuru ume udo maka onwe gị. Kupụ udo maka ndị enyi gị na ezinụlọ gị.
